txt.en: 'The Armoury is fully stocked with weapons and armour and ready to defend us against any enemy that assaults our walls. Now we must send out word across the plains for men and women to come and work in the Armoury. The weapons and armour will not polish and sharpen themselves.'
'Hytbold is one step closer to being rebuilt and restored.'
There is much work to do to rebuild the town of Hytbold.
There is much work to do to rebuild the town of Hytbold.
Bring the Tokens of Hytbold to Edgal
